meanings.definition: A person who wears a red shirt.
meanings.sent1: The team of redshirts played soccer together every weekend.
meanings.sent2: The redshirts cheered loudly from the sidelines.
meanings.sent3: The redshirts decided to have a red shirt party to celebrate their team spirit.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of blue jerseys, the redshirts stood out like bright beacons.
meanings.sent5: The redshirts were easy to spot in the crowd with their vibrant shirts.

meanings.definition: Members of a sports team who are considered expendable or less skilled.
meanings.sent1: The coach relied on the redshirts to fill in during practice.
meanings.sent2: The redshirts worked hard to prove themselves on the field.
meanings.sent3: During the game, the redshirts joked about starting their own team of misfits.
meanings.sent4: Being a redshirt meant always being ready to step up when needed.
meanings.sent5: The redshirts knew their role on the team and embraced it with determination.

meanings.definition: A term used in science fiction to refer to minor characters who are likely to die.
meanings.sent1: In the movie, the redshirts were the first to encounter danger.
meanings.sent2: The redshirts knew their fate as soon as they landed on the alien planet.
meanings.sent3: The redshirts formed a support group to cope with their inevitable demise.
meanings.sent4: The redshirts' survival rate was alarmingly low in the sci-fi series.
meanings.sent5: The redshirts added a sense of suspense to the storyline with their perilous missions.
